name: Advanced machines
description: This chapter is about advanced machines for detection like $(l:3_advanced_machines/camera_and_monitor)cameras$(), $(l:3_advanced_machines/radar)radar$() and $(l:3_advanced_machines/siren)sirens$(), advanced $(l:3_advanced_machines/enantiomorphic_reactor)energy production$() and atomic science with the $(l:3_advanced_machines/large_hadron_collider)Large Hadron Collider$().
